remote.title: orderDetail.theDeliveryQuantityBu
remote.displayedTableHead: 序号,仓库,工厂,交货单编码,sap交货单号,货品代码,货品名称,计划交货数量,已交货数量,本次交货数量,包装单位,产品序号,包装序号
remote.hql: SELECT orderDetail.id, orderDetail.deliveryOrder.warehouse.name, orderDetail.factory.name, orderDetail.deliveryOrder.code, orderDetail.deliveryOrder.sapCode, orderDetail.item.code, orderDetail.item.name, orderDetail.planQuantityBu, orderDetail.delivedQuantityBu, orderDetail.theDeliveryQuantityBu, orderDetail.packageUnit.unit, orderDetail.item.id, orderDetail.packageUnit.id FROM WmsDeliveryOrderDetail orderDetail LEFT JOIN orderDetail.item LEFT JOIN orderDetail.packageUnit LEFT JOIN orderDetail.deliveryOrder LEFT JOIN orderDetail.factory LEFT JOIN orderDetail.deliveryOrder.warehouse WHERE 1=1 AND orderDetail.theDeliveryQuantityBu>0 AND orderDetail.deliveryOrder.status='ACTIVE' AND orderDetail.deliveryOrder.supplier.id = ${wmsTransportOrder.supplier.id} AND (orderDetail.kcdd like :param OR to_char(orderDetail.planQuantityBu) like :param OR to_char(orderDetail.delivedQuantityBu) like :param OR to_char(orderDetail.theDeliveryQuantityBu) like :param ) ORDER BY orderDetail.id

remote.title: wtod.item.id
remote.hql: SELECT item.id, item.code, item.name FROM WmsItem item WHERE item.status = 'ENABLED' AND (item.code LIKE :param OR item.name LIKE :param) ORDER BY item.id

list.title: wtod.packageUnit.id
list.hql: SELECT packageUnit.id, packageUnit.unit FROM WmsPackageUnit packageUnit WHERE 1=1 AND packageUnit.item.id = ${wtod.item.id} ORDER BY packageUnit.id desc
